global.description: - Show error page when CRM initialization fails
- Use local cached contact info to avoid rate limit issue
- Auto call log now supports retrospectively logging up to 100 unlogged records upon extension open

bullhorn.description: - Default note action matching ignores case and spaces
- (It's suggested to disconnect -> refresh Bullhorn page -> connect back again)Issue of session becoming invalid due to user id confusion

global.description: - Unreolved tab is removed now. To check out unlogged calls, there's now a filter on call history page
- Updated notification UI
- Numbers can now be copied from call page and call history page
- Click-to-dial now supports detecting phone numbers in input fields
- Click-to-dial now supports detecting extension numbers with format as eg. +13334445555#134
- Call history page now has a search bar with filters
- Contact pop settings now support both inbound and outbound calls on different timings
- RingCentral team message is added as a new tab (might get delayed to show up)
- More historical call records can be viewed from call history page with 'Load more' button
- Incoming call pop contact page fixed
- User settings are organized in a better way
- Support page is added to user settings
- Community forum is created, can be accessed via support page -> 'Get support'

clio.description: - Number formatters are in user setting contact page now

insightly.description: - Number formatters are in user setting contact page now

global.description: - SMS template remembers orders after close

bullhorn.description: - Bullhorn now has Voicemail default note action

global.description: - An About page in user settings to show info and helper links
- Factor reset now also cleans up unresolved conflicts
- SMS template supports drag and drop to arrange item orders
- Use SMS template that syncs with RingCentral App's SMS template
- Show notification when a call recording link is uploaded
- SMS template cannot apply issue
- Factory Reset button in user settings
- RingCentral sign in issue where pop up sign in window is stuck at loading screen
- Auto log conflict messages now contain more meaningful info

bullhorn.description: - Default Note Action is now moved to User Settings where you can setup default actions. Can also work for auto log.

global.description: - Auto log with conflict resolver
- Manual refersh contact info with button
- Audio volume controls
- SMS messages are now logged as in conversations per day
- New UIs
https://ringcentral.github.io/rc-unified-crm-extension/release-notes/
